LanguageData.Brewing.label: пивоваріння
LanguageData.Brewing.description: Побудуйте пивоварню та бродильні чани, щоб перетворити хміль на смачне-пресмачне пиво.

Brewing.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->brewed a unique stout that became famous across the system
subject_story->retired to run a public house on an animal world

LanguageData.CarpetMaking.label: carpet-making

CarpetMaking.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->learned to weave carpets from hair, for a distant Emperor
subject_story->left behind an unparalleled collection of carpets and tapestries
subject_story->settled on a medieval moon, where the carpetweaving craft was truly appreciated

LanguageData.Cocoa.label: какао
LanguageData.Cocoa.description: Sow cocoa trees to create your own delicious chocolate. Eating chocolate fulfills the need for recreation and it's a valuable trade good too.

Cocoa.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->became obsessed with chocolate and had to be restrained
subject_story->studied the fermentation process of cocoa for a thesis
subject_story->set up the best chocolate shop in the sector

LanguageData.ComplexClothing.label: пошиття одягу
LanguageData.ComplexClothing.description: Шиття більшості типів одягу, такий як штани, плащі, капелюхи тощо.

ComplexClothing.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->tailored hard-wearing clothes for urbworld cityfolk
subject_story->would relax by sewing and telling stories to the village children
subject_story->learned to craft clothing to be worn at [ANYPAWN_possessive] troupe's grand performances

LanguageData.ComplexFurniture.label: меблі
LanguageData.ComplexFurniture.description: Build complex furniture like beds, end tables, dining chairs, armchairs, dressers, tool cabinets, billiards tables, and poker tables, vents, sarcophagi, and more.

ComplexFurniture.generalRules.rulesStrin.li: subject_story->studied woodcarving under a master carpenter
subject_story->built a town of log-cabins singlehandedly
subject_story->established a factory, selling high-quality furniture to passing traders

LanguageData.Devilstrand.label: дияволокно
LanguageData.Devilstrand.description: Дияволокно – повільно ростучий гриб, з якого отримують надзвичайно міцне та жаростійке рослинне волокно.

Devilstrand.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->used devilstrand as a natural firebreak
subject_story->established the techniques for cultivating devilstrand easily
subject_story->became obsessed with mushrooms and became the self-declared Princess of [ANYPAWN_possessive] kingdom

LanguageData.DrugProduction.label: хімічне виробництво
LanguageData.DrugProduction.description: Побудуйте хімічну лабораторію для синтезу основних хімічних речовин. Необхідні подальші дослідження для створення спеціалізованих препаратів.

DrugProduction.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->worked in an asteroid lab on the edge of populated space
subject_story->learned how to craft drugs from recycled chemicals, leading to many years spent in prison
subject_story->worked as a chemist, but slipped into peddling illegal drugs on the side

LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.label: виробництво Go-соку
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.description: Виготовляйте Go-сік - синтетичний препарат, що підвищує навички стрільби, ближнього бою та мобільності, а також притупляє біль.

GoJuiceProduction.generalRules.rulesStri.li: subject_story->was expelled for taking go-juice during team sports matches
subject_story->found go-juice massively increased productivity in mines and lumberyards
subject_story->never went on a mission without go-juice or juggernaut in a pocket

LanguageData.Greatbow.label: довгі луки
LanguageData.Greatbow.description: Створюйте довгі луки для вбивства ворогів на великій відстані.

Greatbow.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->fired an arrow right through the iron helmet of a feudal king
subject_story->hunted muffalos for their fur on a feral world
subject_story->lived alone in the greenwood, a hail of arrows greeting anyone who approached within a mile of its edge

LanguageData.LongBlades.label: довгі леза

LongBlades.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->rode with the Betaduke's Fifth Light Cavalry as they conquered the sector
subject_story->was enslaved as a weaponsmith beneath the arena on an iron age planet
subject_story->trained the hoplites on a warworld to use their weapons' reach

LanguageData.PassiveCooler.label: випарний охолоджувач
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.description: Випарні охолоджувачі застосовують для охолодження приміщень без використання електроенергії.

PassiveCooler.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->moved to a sweltering tropical world and developed unique techniques for staying cool
subject_story->researched primitive techniques for cooling areas in the comfort of a coreworld's libraries
subject_story->noticed, on the shores of an oceanic planet, that it was cooler where the sea spray settled

LanguageData.Pemmican.label: пеммікан
LanguageData.Pemmican.description: Пеммікан - суміш інгредієнтів рослинного та тваринного походження, що не псується протягом тривалого часу. Чудово підходить для подорожей.

Pemmican.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->mastered pemmican production during a long pilgrimage to the planet's Spire
subject_story->survived solely on pemmican when a passenger liner crashed on a glassworld
subject_story->taught pemmican production to feral tribes

LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.label: синтез пеноксициліну
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.description: Виробляйте пеноксицилін - препарат для профілактики захворювань, що блокує чуму, малярію та сонну хворобу.

PenoxycylineProduction.generalRules.rule.li: subject_story->lectured to the United Planets about preventative medicine
subject_story->was driven out of Dawn Falls as a quack, for selling a medicine that "doesn't do anything"
subject_story->prevented an outbreak of malaria from spreading through careful penoxycyline dosage

LanguageData.PlateArmor.label: пластинчата броня
LanguageData.PlateArmor.description: Ковані обладунки з металу або дерева. Це важка броня, що помітно уповільнює рух, але дуже ефективно захищає.

PlateArmor.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->crafted armor from scrap, when the authorities surrounded [ANYPAWN_possessive] family's shack
subject_story->became known as the Green Smith, when moss grew on the wooden armor
subject_story->started the first armorworker's collective on an urbworld

LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.label: переробка психіту
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.description: Переробка листя психолисту у пластівці та порошок - різні форми наркотика психіту.

PsychiteRefining.generalRules.rulesStrin.li: subject_story->used [ANYPAWN_possessive] university job as cover for [ANYPAWN_possessive] drug-dealing
subject_story->started a commune where low-dose flake was mixed into the food
subject_story->campaigned for the legalisation of yayo on a nearby urbworld

LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.label: психітовий чай
LanguageData.PsychoidBrewing.description: Готуйте на багатті чи плиті чай з психолисту, що викликає легку ейфорію і звикання.

PsychoidBrewing.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->joined a short-lived psychoid commune on a cult world
subject_story->experimented with psychoid to help traumatized soldiers
subject_story->legalized psychoid for mass production across several coreworlds, when [ANYPAWN_pronoun] had the power to do so

LanguageData.RecurveBow.label: композитний лук
LanguageData.RecurveBow.description: Створюйте ефективну та недорогу зброю дальнього бою.

RecurveBow.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->tracked a rabid boomalope for four days before killing it with a single arrow
subject_story->settled near a yew forest to secure the perfect materials for bows
subject_story->raised the colony children as hunter-gatherers, with every one a master archer

LanguageData.Smithing.label: ковальство
LanguageData.Smithing.description: Будуйте кузні для виготовлення металевої зброї, такої як ножі, гладіуси та булави. Створюйте з металу чисту та гарну плитку для підлоги.

Smithing.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->settled in a medieval hamlet and mastered simple metal crafting
subject_story->built glitterworld smithies for the Renaissance reenactment guilds

LanguageData.Stonecutting.label: обробка каменю
LanguageData.Stonecutting.description: Обтісування кам'яних уламків в придатні для будівництва блоки. Будуйте красиву кам'яну плитку або бетонні доріжки.

Stonecutting.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->was the first in a line of temple designers, all sharing the same name
subject_story->developed unique techniques for cutting the hardest rock with basic tools
subject_story->tiled the entirety of the viceroy's palace on a medieval world

LanguageData.TreeSowing.label: вирощування дерев
LanguageData.TreeSowing.description: Висаджуйте дерева, що можуть рости у вашому біомі.

TreeSowing.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->propagated trees across a long-dead planetoid, trying to bring life back
subject_story->published a paper about maintaining natural ecosystems
subject_story->worked in a tree nursery on an animal world

LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.label: виробництво бадьорину
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.description: Синтезуйте бадьорин - препарат для підвищення продуктивності, який знижує потребу у сні.

WakeUpProduction.generalRules.rulesStrin.li: subject_story->tried to overcome caffeine addiction by taking wake-up
subject_story->treated narcoleptics and sleepwalkers with carefully timed wake-up doses
subject_story->moved everyone to the dark side of an asteroid and used wake-up to maintain their biorhythms
